Episode.GuestStars: |Becky Ann Baker|Cathy Salvodon|Christianne Tisdale|Clark Carmichael|Clark Middleton|David Berman|Denia Brache|Elizabeth Inghram|Erika Woods|Gerson Gomez|Guy Margo|Jon Conver|Kelley Curran|Ken Leung|Lawrence Winslow|Liz McCartney|Lou Martini Jr.|Margaret Ivey|Mark Linn-Baker|Matthew Porretta|Nancy Meyer|Nimo Gandhi|Ralph Adriel Johnson|Randy Kovitz|Richard Toth|Susan Oliveras|Tessa Frascogna|
Episode.Overview: Red and Dembe enlist Glen’s help in stacking the jury to Red’s advantage. The Task Force investigates a series of mysterious deaths resulting from weaponized insects.
